original.value: Special Engineer's Suit\nIncreases sprint distance by 40%\n This new, secret suit is created by military bureau "Spor ants" inc. Chief designer was the famous Mr. "Keeman". With a "touch of genius" he put his hand to the famous military things, such as "Mech", set of weapons named "Crown" etc. Bureau is independent and delivers equipment for Warface and Blackwood.

translation.value: 杰出工程师护甲\n冲刺距离增加 40%\n这件全新的秘密作战服是由军务部“世安”公司开发的。首席设计师正是大名鼎鼎的“基曼”先生。享有“天才之手”之名的他曾参与过著名军事装备“机师”、以及命名为“皇冠”的武器及装备套件等多项研发。军务部独立运作，专为战争前线小队及黑木集团提供装备。

translation.value: 来自奥罗拉女子别动队的士兵。\n使冲刺距离增加 40%\n她就像金星上的黎明一样美丽又致命，身手极其敏捷，速度奇快无比，是战场上真正具有威胁的作战单位。她擅长通过快速攻击使敌军队伍陷入混乱。

original.value: Lady Engineer \nIncreases sprint distance by 40% \nSpecial skin makes Engineer looks beautiful and deadly dangerous.

translation.value: 来自奥罗拉女子别动队的工程技术专家。\n使冲刺距离增加 40%\n一名快速敏捷的突击队员，能够在敌方总部掀起风暴。还能修复受损的护甲，为队伍提供支援。偏爱从侧翼攻击敌人并使用冲锋枪朝惊慌失措的对手开火。

translation.value: 来自奥罗拉女子别动队的战地医疗兵\n使冲刺距离增加 40%\n奥罗拉的战地医疗兵随时准备冲进激烈的战斗中去救助战友。她会给挡路的任何人带来痛苦——这些看似柔弱的女医疗兵不但可以拯救生命，也可以毫不留情地带走生命，狠辣程度足以让久经沙场的雇佣兵敬畏。

translation.value: 来自奥罗拉女子别动队的射手\n使冲刺距离增加 40%\n奥罗拉的狙击手，沉默、致命，不喜长时间枪战。她们会在目标最虚弱时发动突袭并在敌人还击之前消失，再次出现时就会在另一个地方发动新的攻击了。

translation.value: 阿尔法突击队狙击手

original.value: Sniper of the "Domination squad" \nCold blooded master of fighting at long range. \nFew people can boast that they have seen a sniper from this division, because the dead do not talk and it tells the incredible effectiveness of these snipers.

translation.value: 作为阿尔法小队的高素质成员，被训练以应对所有现代作战场景。该小队会被派遣至全球最危险的作战地区。她通过战术性地猎杀主要目标来支援她的团队。

translation.value: 阿尔法突击队工程师

original.value: Engineer of the "Domination squad" \nWhat could be more beautiful than stunning beauty lady which is engaged in military sabotage? Cold-blooded, beauty, mortality and all this compound is an engineer from Domination squad.

translation.value: 作为阿尔法小队的高素质成员，被训练以应对所有现代作战场景。该小队会被派遣至全球最危险的作战地区。她靠提供重要的护甲修复来减少队友所受的伤害，支援全队作战。

original.value: Soldier from "Paragon Squad"

translation.value: “无畏战士小队”步枪手

original.value: Soldier from "Paragon Squad" \nDeadly soldier from "Paragon Squad". Trained master of assault and storm of enemy lines.\nHis skills make him really powerful force which enemies need to consider.

translation.value: “无畏战士小队”步枪手\n来自“无畏战士小队”的致命士兵，他们经过训练，是突击和冲垮敌方阵线的大师。\n他们的技巧让他们成为令敌人畏惧的强大力量。

original.value: Medic from "Paragon Squad"

translation.value: “无畏战士小队”医疗兵

original.value: Medic from "Paragon Squad" \nDue to new technologies in protection from all warfare vulnerabilities. Medic of "Paragon Squad" bring new possibilities of engagement in battle.\nHe can with ease destroy enemies and help teammates.

translation.value: “无畏战士小队”医疗兵\n这些来自“无畏战士小队”的医疗兵们有着保护所有队友的新科技，为交战带来了新的可能性。\n他们能轻松消灭敌人和帮助他们的队友。

original.value: Sniper from "Paragon Squad"

translation.value: “无畏战士小队”狙击手

original.value: Sniper from "Paragon Squad" \nSnipers from "Paragon Squad" adapted for long last and long range combat situation due to their participationin key military operations.\nSnipers from this squad are very deadly and versatile independent combat unit in fight.

translation.value: “无畏战士小队”狙击手\n来自“无畏战士小队”的狙击手们经过训练，多次参与重要军事行动，适应持久的远距作战环境。\n在战斗中，来自该小队的狙击手致命、技术全面、擅长单兵作战。

original.value: Engineer from "Paragon Squad"

translation.value: “无畏战士小队”工程师

original.value: Engineer from "Paragon Squad" \nTrained as support unit, engineer from "Paragon Squad" also can provide all possible supportof firepower and attack on enemies for teammates.\nGood war training and last equipment technologies grants engineer from "Paragon Squad" great support and attacking opportunities.

translation.value: “无畏战士小队”工程师\n被训练成为一个支援单位。从“无畏战士小队”来的工程师们能为他们的队伍提供巨大的帮助，并且拥有多样化的进攻方式。

original.value: Soldier of the "Ghost squad" \nIncreases sprint distance by 50% \nGhosts are trained to execute raids (focused short-duration attacks). Typical tasks include: to assassinate or kidnap high value targets, secure or destroy sensitive documents and classified hardware, sabotage or harassment of the enemy.

original.value: Soldier "ATLAS SFG"

translation.value: “阿特拉斯 SFG ”士兵

original.value: Soldier of the "ATLAS" special forces group ATLAS SFG provide fully capable special operations forces to defend modern society its interests and plan and synchronize operations against terrorist networks. Agents work on the territory of the whole world. Atlas of the world for them is atlas of war.

translation.value: “阿特拉斯”特种部队作战群的士兵 阿特拉斯特种部队作战群能够提供经过良好训练的专业人员来保护现代社会及其利益和打击恐怖组织的战略和战术行动。 这群特工们可以被部署到地球上的任意位置。 他们的行动舞台往往也是战争的命脉所在。
